We're working on adding flexibility with tokens to more workflow actions fields with <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/workflows/use-associated-record-data-in-workflows|this beta> <@U05786NSSH2> We've already made it possible to use cross object tokens in the request body fields (if you dont have access and want it DM me your hub ID). so no specific timeline or plan for that URL field but adding to more fields is our active project at the moment so it wont be forgotten about
